name: InfectionsOfKidney
title: Infections of Kidney
description: This value set is used to calculate OP-10 (Abdomen Computed Tomography (CT)—Use of Contrast Material), a claims-based measure used in the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services' Hospital Outpatient Quality Reporting (HOQR) Program. In calculation of OP-10, diagnoses of infections of the kidney must appear on the abdomen CT claim to be excluded from the measure’s initial patient population.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-10 codes associated with Infections of Kidney.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with Infections of Kidney.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-10 codes associated with Infections of Kidney are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with Infections of Kidney are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than ICD-10 are also excluded from the value set.)
